name: Get exercises
description: Проверяет получение списка заданий по course_id через API.

steps.name: Check that response status code equals to <HTTPStatus.OK: 200>
Check that length of exercises equals to 1
Check that 'title' equals to 'Cover per will expect outside woman.'

Check that 'description' equals to 'Theory clearly agree just able. Support debate right field.
Seven represent offer option realize. Adult if control morning. Who goal top.'
